page.title: 12THE QUILTERY, TACOLNESTON
page.content: The Victorian stable block behind Tacolneston Hall became well-known in the late 70's when the Quiltery was founded. From here handsewn quilts, cushions & patchwork kits were distributed worldwide. In 10 years the business has changed considerably.No more handsewn products are made here,however the brand name {"The Quiltery"}is found on wellknown patchwork & quilting patterns together with a picture of the building.These are distributed to shops throughout the country.The stable building is also the headquarters of the{National {Patchwork Championships,}an annual event,held at country houses.This event attempts to retain the original rural atmosphere created at Tacolneston where the first quilt exhibitions were hung out on the washing line.
